title: Covid-19 Tracker
text: Texts recipients about the daily number of cases, deaths, death rate, and increase in cases from the day before.

title: Meke
alt: Picture of Meke's addition skill being played
text: Helps students in elementary school students gamify learning math!

title: MaskUp
alt: Picture of MaskUp's live detection feature.
text: Check whether you're wearing a mask. Includes data visualization & statistics.

title: EnviroHelp
alt: Picture of the homepage of EnviroHelp.
text: Upload an item and see if it's recyclable!

title: Focale
alt: Picture of the Focale chrome extension popup
text: Chrome extension designed to help students time and pace their studies efficiently. 1000+ active users.

title: Spotion
alt: Picture of Spotion's landing page
text: Generate 50-song Spotify playlists from your selfies!

title: LiveTranslate
alt: Picture of Live Translate's landing page
text: Translate from English into 6 different languages, in real time!

title: AWS Lambda Workshop
alt: Screenshot of AWS Lambda Workshop from serverless days
text: AWS workshop that was presented at the 2021 Serverless Days Student Edition conference. The workshop was designed to teach students how to use AWS Lambda.

title: CounselorBot
alt: Screenshot of CounselorBot's download page
text: GitHub bot that autonomously guides students through GitHub learning repositories.

title: Valence Robotics Website
alt: Picture of Valence Robotics's landing page
text: Developed the Valence Robotics website (FRC Team #8429), a non-profit FIRST robotics team in its first year.

title: UniHeart
alt: Picture of UniHeart's landing page
text: Detect heart disease at home using 2 machine learning algorithms, all coded from scratch.

title: #IAmCS Website
alt: Picture of #IAmCS's landing page
text: Built the website for #IAmCS, NC-wide effort providing students exposure to computer science and STEM careers.

title: The Coding Foundation Website
alt: Picture of TCF website
text: Built the website of The Coding Foundation, a non-profit organization that provides coding lessons to students.

title: Bit Project Website
alt: Picture of Bit Project's landing page
text: Built the website for Bit Project, a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization that provides free mentorship programs to students.

title: Durham Meals on Wheels 2021 Report Website
alt: Picture of Durham Meals on Wheels's landing page
text: Built the 2021 report website for Durham Meals on Wheels, showcasing the impact of their charity work.

title: University of North Carolina @ Wilmington Wang Lab Website
alt: Picture of The Wang Lab's home page
text: Designed, developed, and tested The Wang Lab's website in collaboration with another developer.

title: RiemannAI
alt: Picture of RiemanAI' home page
text: Web app designed to summarize, translate, and save spoken text.

title: ClimateSafe
alt: Picture of ClimateSafe mounted on a robot dog
text: Built ClimateSafe, an autonomous air-quality sensing unit that uses a Heltec ESP32 microcontroller.

title: Tuning Your Musical Instrument with Machine Learning
alt: Thumbnail of workshop slide titled "Tuning Your Instrument with Machine Learning"
text: Created a 45 min workshop for middle school students on how to tune their instruments using machine learning.

title: Text Summarization using Python
alt: Thumbnail of workshop slide titled "Text Summarization using Python"
text: Developed and filmed a workshop for students with no prior programming experience as a gentle intro to NLP.

title: Markdown Parser
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Markdown Parser
text: Developed a markdown parser that converts markdown into HTML. Supports creating, viewing, sharing markdown files

title: The Internet's Journal
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of The Internet's Journal
text: Developed a website that allows users to create and share journal entries with others. Posts can be shared, liked, reported, moderated, and ranked based on popularity

title: Caffeine 2.0
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Caffeine 2.0
text: Developed a website that prevents you from falling asleep while at your computer. Plays nasty sounds each time you blink!

title: Calendo
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Calendo
text: Won Education Track @ HackGT X. Calendo is a gamified todolist built for school systems.

title: Aire
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Aire
text: Aire generates personalized resumes & cover letters based on job description.

title: Apache Airvata MFT UI
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Airvata MFT UI
text: Allows users to manage files between cloud and local storage.

title: Cybershuttle Local Agent
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of Cybershuttle Local Agent UI
text: Used by 300 scientists to submit and manage experiments running on supercomputers.

title: GT Class Reviews
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of GT Class Reviews
text: Allows students to review and rate their classes at Georgia Tech.

title: GT Academic Calendars
alt: Thumbnail of the homepage of GT Academic Calendars
text: Used by 5,000 Georgia Tech students. Visualizes GT's Academic Calendar.

title: Bike Rack Finder
alt: Bike Rack Finder homepage
text: Find bicycle racks near you! In iOS beta testing.

title: Airavata Research Service
alt: Airavata Research Catalog homepage
text: Funded by NSF research grant. Allows scientists to bundle jupyter notebooks + datasets on HPCs.
